channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Apps for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Apps for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-27240|2024-07-15T17:17:55.080Z -- zoom%20communications%2C%20inc -- zoom%20apps%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in the installer for some Zoom Apps for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct a privilege escalation via local access.
